Author: gkelleyr
Text: Lmao in the height of my food obsession/restriction (lw 108) my scale died so every morning before I had my coffee (because duh it would add weight to the scale AnD HoW WouLD I KnOW the TRue NuMbEr!?) I would walk to the gym (10 minutes) get on the scale and then breathe a sigh of relief like I could start my day. Thirty minutes each morning and I’m an idiot and didn’t realize I actually had batteries for it in the house.  By the time I learned the batteries were there, I already had tried to quit restricting and weighing myself. Now I’m 125 at 5’5 and going back to tracking because I feel fat af

Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: If it’s electronic and the batteries are old you might try replacing them.
